channel.title: O3 Magazine Subscription
channel.description: Issue and Site Announcements for O3 Magazine

item.title: New o3 website online
item.description: We are pleased to announce the launch of the new o3 website. The new site has been rolled out on a faster US connection. We have also added a European server in the UK.

item.title: o3 Issue #4 Now Available
item.description: O3 issue #4 is now available for download via HTTP. Many corporate firewalls block FTP so the HTTP option was added with an additional server to handle the load.

item.title: O3 Issue #3 Now Available
item.description: O3 issue #3 is now available for download via HTTP. Many corporate firewalls block FTP so the HTTP option was added with an additional server to handle the load.

item.title: O3 Issue #2 Now Available
item.description: O3 issue #2 is now available for download via HTTP. Many corporate firewalls block FTP so the HTTP option was added with an additional server to handle the load.

item.title: O3 HTTP Downloads
item.description: O3 is now available for download via HTTP. Many corporate firewalls block FTP so the HTTP option was added with an additional server to handle the load.

item.title: O3 Subscriber RSS Feed
item.description: We are pleased to announce the availability of an RSS Subscriber feed for O3. This RSS feed will alert our readers when the next issue of O3 is available as well as enhancements to the site.
